long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sunny Side in an extension which provides you with affirmations. 

We often dive into negative thoughts, and even if not true, we talk ourselves into believing them and develop a negative outlook.
Affirmations are positive statements that can help you overcome self-sabotaging and negative thoughts. When you repeat them often, and believe in them, you can start to make positive changes.

Whenever feeling down, or in need of that small motivational boost to keep moving forward, a click on this extension may provide you with just what you need.

A web browsers is the tool used utmost on a computer, thus an extension is quite accessible at all times. Sunny Side will be right there when you need it.

Built on the belief that relentless positive thinking empowers one to let their thoughts shape their reality, I most sincerely hope Sunny Side pushes you towards it.
